attributes.title: OMG
attributes.review: This app literally almost broke my phone. i literally thought i couldn’t use it anymore. thanks you dumbass cheeto 🤢

attributes.title: This app is terrible!
attributes.review: The second I opened it my eyes were disgusted. The font,color, wording, etc. we’re unappealing to the eyes. This app was not easy to navigate around and all in all, a bad app in general! When I tried putting my mobile phone number, it didn’t give me my code and it kept giving me errors. All cluttered and as I said before, no taste or style in the app. The only good thing I got from it is knowing I’m able to delete it in one click of the button. Trump 2020 but this app is not it buddy.

attributes.title: When I opened this app poop poured out of my but
attributes.review: This app is disgusting and I was very confused why when I first opened the app there was a Cheeto staring at me? I’m not sure this was a sponsorship but there shouldn’t be a Cheeto with oddly shaped hair. I was so disgusted you know what happened. This app should be banned!!

attributes.title: 🍊 is not the new ⚫️
attributes.review: I downloaded the app so that I continue listening to Mr.Trump’s great advice on which household cleaners to drink to prevent getting COVID-19. HOWEVER, when I opened up the app all I saw was an ORANGE with cotton candy hair! I realized it was Donald soon after but that pic of him was just NOT it. If I was a billionaire, I wouldn’t let people take photos of me like that. Simply, 💞🧚‍♀️take it down👌😌. I also couldn’t find the section of the app where it told me what UV lights I should stay under to kill the coronavirus. I think I’ll just take the approach of pretending it doesn’t exist like our good ol Mr. Orange Trump. The app itself was glitchy and took way too long to download. It even required a phone number!, which if you ask me, just seems kinda desperate. Like trump is trying TOO hard to get my contacts 🤪. I rate Trump a 0/10 cos he do be kinda asking for it too much. Obama had more pride and I’m pretty sure his app would’ve been better if he made one.

attributes.title: Worst app ever🤢
attributes.review: When opening the app I was greeted by the ugliest creature to walk this earth. I will be mortified forever and will now have to take therapy.thanks a lot.
